app_descript:
Fall Guys Royale

Brief: Fall Guys Royale brings the colorful, chaotic, and utterly fun battle royale experience to your mobile device. Prepare to dive, dodge, and dash your way through zany obstacles as you strive to outlast dozens of other players vying for the crown of ultimate victory!
